org.freehep.util.io
Class ActionHeader

java.lang.Object
  org.freehep.util.io.ActionHeader

public class ActionHeader
extends Object

Keeps the actionCode and Length of a specific action. To be used in the TaggedInputStream to return the actionCode and Length, and in the TaggedOutputStream to write them.

Version:
$Id: src/main/java/org/freehep/util/io/ActionHeader.java 96b41b903496 2005/11/21 19:50:18 duns $
Author:
Mark Donszelmann, Charles Loomis
